name: Burn Notice
text: Give to the Natasha Romanoff player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Natasha Romanoff → remove this card from the game. • Discard the [[Preparation]] card you control with the highest cost. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Taskmaster
text:
[star] Taskmaster gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each upgrade you control. (Black Widow's nemesis minion.)
[star] Boost: For this activation, the villain gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each upgrade you control.

name: Killer for Hire
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1[per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "What is Hydra doing here?" — Carol Danvers
name: Hydra Mercenary
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

name: Deadly Shot
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an upgrade you control and place 1 threat on the main scheme. When Revealed (Hero): Discard an upgrade you control and take 1 damage.
